label.intro:
What is the research question for this survey?


We suggest: “What are the statistical skills of students enrolled in the Research Methods for Agroecology course?” 

Do you think this is the right question? We’re not sure. How do you think this question can be improved? 

Think carefully about what information is useful for us to know. What do we need to know to adapt the course to your needs?
